title: Mercedes pulls U.S. E-Class ad touting self-driving car
description: Mercedes-Benz has withdrawn an advert in the United States which compared its new E-class with a futuristic self-driving concept car following allegations from local consumer groups that the marketing claims were misleading.

title: Australia plans new co-ordinates to fix sat-nav gap
description: Australia is to shift its longitude and latitude to address a gap between local co-ordinates and those from global navigation satellite systems (GNSS).

title: Credit Suisse to create U.S. banking business for billionaires
description: Credit Suisse Group AG (CSGN.S), which exited its U.S. private wealth business last year, is building out a new investment banking group in the region to serve billionaires.
